Articles.Content:
unlimited government funding. highly expendable astronauts. numerous test crashes trying anything to get to space. that mustache on Wernher von Kerman.

WE ARE THE KERMUNISTS

unlimited government funding. highly expendable astronauts. numerous test crashes trying anything to get to space. that mustache on Wernher von Kerman.

WE ARE THE KERMUNISTS

I have a five year plan to fix everything.

~ Kladimir Lenin

Wernher von Kerman.

Well theres your problem, we should have Sergei Kerman.
Don't forget, we appear to have no real leader or government. So, we are full-on anarchists, too!

Don't forget, we appear to have no real leader or government. So, we are full-on anarchists, too!

OR....WE ARE THE DICTATOR, and we personally oversee the space program.
I'd say total anarchy haha
Further evidence: The KSC uses tracks to move their rockets to the launchpad, not treaded platforms.

Further evidence: The KSC uses tracks to move their rockets to the launchpad, not treaded platforms.

They don't use anything! They use teleportation! Thus proof, they are from THE FUTURE!

YES! YES! We are the "Humans". A million years after KSP happened, kerbals with of have evolved into humans with teleportation technology and time travel! We are the select many chosen for a special mission! Go back in time and teach our green ansectors the secret of rocketry so they can one day send a rocket with Earth, seeding it with life!

Or the other way around: kerbals are the remnants of the human race billions of years after the sun exploded and well into the formation of a new solar system. Humans have evolved into a hivemind race with no need for need for food and oxygen. Only explosions can destroy them!
They are Smurfs. The blue ones went the way of magic, the green ones when the way of technology.
This.... escalated quickly.

they don't use anything! They use teleportation! Thus proof, they are from the future!

time traveling kermunists!

"The goal of kocialism is kommunism.

Kladimir Klenin"

"One kerbal with an SRB can control 100 without one.

Kladimir Klenin"

They are Smurfs. The blue ones went the way of magic, the green ones when the way of technology.

Communist anarchist Smurfs from the future.

Seems legit.

Note my flag and plaque in my sig. Yes, I had this in mind when I created them. We are Kommies, with Kommunity Centers, and with a 1984 Orwellian twist (thought crimes).

Another unintended, but now proud result of my flag: It shows up in the VAB, so now my Kerbal rocket builders have "Obey you will" hovering above their little heads all day and all night long. Notice there are no Kerbin cities, everyone lives and works there, 24/7. But since they have been raised that way, it is situation normal, they know no other life, and they think they are happy.

did Yoda come up with that propaganda xD

They don't use anything! They use teleportation! Thus proof, they are from THE FUTURE!

Futuristic kerbal communists. Interesting.
And here I was thinking of KSC2 as the Baikonur analogue...
Jeb is the leader of the Kerbals!
